page.title: 07EXTRACT 520/65 0467 CONT
page.content: tax/ office and dole office. {FARMING:}There is some cultivated grassland. {HEALTH:}The Howden Health Centre i9s being moved to the grounds of the new hospital. {HOUSING:}This area contains some very recently built houses which are between 2 and 5 years old. {POPULATION:}The population is made up of mainly young families. {RELIGION:}The Free Church of Scotland has its only building in Livingston in this area. {TRANSPORT:}This area contains 1 interchange and 3 roundabouts. Most of the roads in the area are quite new.
